Paragraph: Moreover , we emphasize that those HOMO and LUMO levels as well as their band gaps are in the ideal range for the high PCEs according to Brabec et al.'s estimation.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| LUMO levels |
| band gaps |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| LUMO levels |
| band gaps |

(Note: In this context, "HOMO" and "LUMO" refer to the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital and the Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital of a material, respectively, which are material properties.)
